questions.title: midterm date
questions.content: hi dr hao,do you knowwhether the midterm is likely to be on monday, wednesday, or friday thanks

responses.content: the midterm will be inclass, so there would be no time conflicts polling will be conducted when everyone has activated their piazza account in the first two weeks the most popular option will be chosen

questions.title: how do register my github username for lab
questions.content: how do register my github username for lab missed the email of where can register my username so how do register it for lab

responses.content: if you filled out the survey on time, try going to githubcomcsciwwu while logged in to your account and see if you have an invite to join
sent out the second round of invitations for people who were late

questions.title: good place to download java jdk
questions.content: does the following link contain what need to download java on my windows 10 you for your timeaustin

responses.content: versions above are actively maintained if you don't want to go through this trouble, jdk 18 also works fine
alternatively you can get it openjdk 11 and find the prebuilt installer for your os, this may be easier than the official site
